Dashboard page!!

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(p8105.datasets)
```

```{r}
data("ny_noaa")
```


```{r}
noaa_df =
  ny_noaa %>% 
  slice_sample(n = 300000) %>% 
 separate(date, c("year","month","day")) %>% 
  mutate(
    year = as.factor(year),
    month = as.factor(month),
    day = as.factor(day),
    tmax = as.integer(tmax),
    tmin = as.integer(tmin)
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    prcp = (prcp * 10),
    tmax = (tmax * 10),
    tmin = (tmin * 10)
  )
  
```
